message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_FV_FORENAME_OR_SURNAME_SHORT
message.locale: Both first name and last name must be at least 1 character long.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_XFV_FORENAME_OR_SURNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply both a forename and a surname.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_ALTNAME_FV_NAMETYPE
message.locale: The first name recorded for a person must be of type "registered" or "preferred".

message.name: ERR_PERSON_FV_NAMETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply a name type for person.
